subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: Toronto Raptors Coach Dwane Casey was fined $25,000 by the N.B.A. for criticizing officials Wednesday night after a loss at Atlanta.
snippet: Toronto Raptors Coach Dwane Casey was fined $25,000 by the N.B.A. for criticizing officials Wednesday night after a loss at Atlanta.
